GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v6.1.8
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: hci_qca: Fix driver shutdown on closed serdev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit ea3ebda47dd56f6e1c62f2e0e1b6e1b0a973e447, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7e7bbddd029b644f00f0ffbfbc485ed71977d0d5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Bluetooth: hci_qca: Fix driver shutdown on closed serdev
